content.en: Energy-efficient algorithms: Researchers have been exploring ways to improve the energy efficiency of wireless sensor networks. They have developed algorithms such as EERMA, artificial bee colony, ant colony optimization, and others to optimize routing and clustering in these networks. These algorithms use computational intelligence and swarm intelligence approaches to enhance energy utilization and extend the network lifetime.
content.da: Energieffektive algoritmer: Forskere har udforsket måder at forbedre energieffektiviteten i trådløse sensornetværk. De har udviklet algoritmer såsom EERMA, kunstig bipopulation, myrekolonisering optimering og andre for at optimere rutning og klyngeinddeling i disse netværk. Disse algoritmer anvender beregningsintelligens og sværmintelligens tilgange for at forbedre energiudnyttelsen og forlænge netværkets levetid.
